game.games.flappybird

Class FlappyBirdVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • game.games.flappybird.FlappyBirdVisualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class FlappyBirdVisualizer
extends processing.core.PApplet
    This class is responsible for drawing the FlappyBird game to the screen.

    Note that a game can manually be started here by calling the main function

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fabian von der Warth

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) FlappyBird b
      To be visualized game instance
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<FlappyBirdMove> fbm
      Already calculated moves waiting to be visualized
      static int frameRate
      Frame rate of game when started manually
      static int HEIGHT
      Height of the game window in pixels
      (package private) int listpos
      Position in the list fbm
      (package private) boolean player
      Whether there is a live player or the game will be shown with already calculated moves
      static int WIDTH
      Width of the game window in pixels
